items.title: Top banner ad visibility
items.description: Fixed issue where top banner ads would still appear when the 'hide top banner' toggle was enabled. The system now properly removes ad units when they should be hidden, ensuring the setting works as expected.

items.title: JWPlayer permission control
items.description: Added permission-based access control for the JWPlayer drawer. The JWPlayer feature is now hidden unless manually activated through the access_jwplayer permission, giving you better control over which users can access this video feature.

items.title: JWPlayer editor access
items.description: Added JWPlayer to the editor drawer with self-service support in Labrador, making it easier to embed and manage video content in your articles.

items.title: RSS feed publication dates
items.description: Added publication date (pubDate) to RSS feeds for better compatibility with feed readers and aggregators. This ensures your content displays with the correct publication timestamp.

items.title: Byline image spacing fix
items.description: Fixed spacing issue where byline images in teasers with background colors lost their right margin, ensuring consistent layout across all teaser styles.

items.title: Paywall preview in admin
items.description: Fixed the paywall preview display in the admin panel. The preview area now correctly shows your paywall configuration instead of just showing custom AI sales pitch text.

items.title: AB test preload configuration
items.description: Improved A/B test integration to preserve existing preload configurations, preventing conflicts with other features that use preloading.

items.title: AI image metadata generation
items.description: Added AI-powered metadata generation for images. You can now automatically generate alt text, captions, and tags when uploading images. The system supports multiple languages and allows custom prompts. Metadata can be regenerated anytime with a simple click on the wand icon. This improves accessibility, SEO, and makes images easier to search for later.

items.title: Draggable element icons
items.description: Added specific icons for different content elements when dragging them in the editor, making it easier to identify what you're moving. Icons now appear both when dragging from within the editor and from collections.

items.title: Toplist background spacing
items.description: Fixed excessive spacing before and after toplist elements when using background colors, providing a cleaner visual appearance.

items.title: Admin paywall preview template
items.description: Added dedicated template for paywall preview in admin settings, separating editor and frontend templates for better maintainability.

items.title: Sitemap configuration settings
items.description: Added admin settings page for configuring sitemaps. You can now enable or disable article, tag, front page, and author page sitemaps, and set minimum article thresholds for tags and authors to appear in sitemaps.

items.title: Pugpig slideshow support
items.description: Added required markup for slideshow galleries in RSS feeds to properly display in Pugpig mobile apps. Slideshow images now include the data-image-group attribute and pp-media--gallery class.

items.title: TSV chart data parsing
items.description: Improved the reliability of chart data import from TSV format. The system now better handles undefined values, empty lines, and whitespace, preventing errors during data import.

items.title: Author box enhancements
items.description: Improved the author box with vertical text alignment options for horizontal layouts, better icon support for phone/email/url, and improved semantics with H1 tags for names. Settings panel now uses clearer display options instead of hide options.

items.title: Multiline image spacing
items.description: Fixed image spacing in multiline text elements with content padding, ensuring consistent layout and proper margins.

items.title: Gallery navigation improvements
items.description: Enhanced slideshow gallery navigation so clicking an image opens it directly in the gallery instead of showing all images again. URLs now update when navigating through images, and the close button returns you to the slideshow position in the article.

items.title: Text decoration styling
items.description: Improved text decoration handling to not apply default text-decoration styles when set to 'default', giving you cleaner control over text styling.

items.title: Changelog element updates
items.description: Changelog elements now automatically update in the editor when you modify the changelog in article settings, eliminating the need to manually refresh.

items.title: Publishing timezone awareness
items.description: Added timezone information to the publishing date picker and dynamic titles that change based on whether an article is scheduled or already published. This helps you understand the timezone context when scheduling articles for future publication.

items.title: Rounded byline images setting
items.description: Added admin setting to make all byline images circular site-wide. Enable this in Admin > Article Settings > Byline Settings to give your author images a consistent rounded appearance.

items.title: Paywall styling options
items.description: Added extensive styling options for paywall sales posters including border color, border radius, border width for offers, and button background color and border radius. These settings are available in Admin > Paywall Options.
